title: Create a tbl pointer to Canoodle. — canoodle_tbl
code: if (FALSE) { conn <- connect_cdw()  canoodle_tbl(conn)  canoodle_tbl(conn, "ICU_STAY_DATAMART")  disconnect_cdw(conn) }

text: concise sql statement ready passed SQL Server/Snowflake, etc.

title: get the results of a SQL query — read_sql
text: original version function developed Thomas Huang.

title: get the results of a SQL query — read_sql
code: if (FALSE) { sql_statement <- read_sql(here::here("SQL/demo.sql"))  # use dbGetQuery for single SQL clauses results <- ccdm_query(sql_statement)  # use snowsql for complex SQL statements with multiple clauses results2 <- system2("~/bin/snowsql", glue("-f {sql_statement} -o quiet={quiet}"))  }
